sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' import {parse, formatTime, formatResultNum, sort, filter} from './functions' import queryData from './data/tests.json' import styled from 'styled-components' import {Comment} from '@styled-icons/boxicons-solid/Comment' import {Play} from '@styled-icons/boxicons-regular/Play' import Moment from 'react-moment' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import { Row, Col, Container } from 'react-bootstrap' export class Serp extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { value: '', currentSearchParam: null, resultNum: null, hasBeenSearched: false, dateFilter: "any", durationFilter: "any", featuredFilter: "any", filtered: false, results: [], filteredResults: [] } } onInputChange = (e) => { this.setState({ value: e.target.value }) } onSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() if(this.state.value.length === 0) { alert('Redirected to https://vimeo.com/search?q=') } else { this.setState({ currentSearchParam: this.state.value, hasBeenSearched: true, results: await parse(queryData), resultNum: await formatResultNum(queryData) }) } } onSortChange = (e) => { this.setState({ results: sort(this.state.results, this.state.dateFilter, this.state.durationFilter, this.state.featuredFilter, e.target.value) }) } onDateFilterChange = async (e) => { await this.setState({dateFilter: e.target.value}) this.updateResults() } onDurationFilterChange = async (e) => { await this.setState({durationFilter: e.target.value}) this.updateResults() } onFeaturedFilterChange = async (e) => { await this.setState({featuredFilter: e.target.value}) this.updateResults() } updateResults = async () => { await this.setState({ filteredResults: filter(this.state.results, this.state.dateFilter, this.state.durationFilter, this.state.featuredFilter) }) } render() { const Button = styled.button` background: transparent; border-radius: 3px; border: 2px solid #59b2ed; color: #59b2ed; margin: 0 1em; padding: 0.25em 1em; ` const Whitecomment = styled(Comment)` padding-right: 5px; color: white; height: 60%; width: auto; ` const Whiteplay = styled(Play)` padding-bottom: 3px; color: white; height: 100%; width: auto; ` const hasBeenSearched = this.state.hasBeenSearched const param = this.state.currentSearchParam const resultNum = this.state.resultNum const results = (this.state.filtered) ? this.state.filteredResults : this.state.results const resultsMap = results.map((video) => { const duration = formatTime(video.duration) const featured = (video.featured) ? "result-box featured" : "result-box" return (
{video.created} ago
{video.plays}
{video.comments}
{duration}
{video.name}
{video.user}
) }) let searched = (hasBeenSearched) ?
{resultNum} results for "{param}"
: return ( {/* filler col space */}
{searched}
{/* filler col space */} {/* NEEDS TO MOVE TOP RIGHT ON SMALL SCREENS */}

Sort by:

 {/* NEEDS TO BE A LEFT SIDE POP OUT ON SMALL SCREENS */}

Filter by:

Data Uploaded
  • Any
  • Last 365 Days
  • Last 30 Days
  • Last 7 Days
Duration
  • Any
  • Short (<4:00)
  • Med. (4 - 10:00)
  • Long (>10:00)
Staff Picks
  • Any
  • Featured
{resultsMap} {/* filler space col */} ) } } export default Serp
